meanings.sent1: The tree rebranched after the storm damaged its branches.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to rebranched its products to attract more customers.
meanings.sent3: The river rebranched into smaller streams, creating a beautiful landscape.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas rebranched into new innovative projects, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent5: The vine rebranched vigorously, reaching every corner of the garden.

meanings.sent1: The rebranched tree provided more shade in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The rebranched company expanded its reach to new markets.
meanings.sent3: The rebranched road led to a scenic route through the mountains.
meanings.sent4: Her rebranched career offered exciting opportunities for growth.
meanings.sent5: The rebranched plant looked even more beautiful with its new growth.
